skill_constraints: Single point of failure on DevOps expertise.
resource_bottlenecks: FE Lead for architecture and CI/CD tasks in early sprints.
mitigation_strategies: Use mock servers to de-couple from backend; FE Lead to prioritize mentoring.

skill_constraints: Onboarding overhead for the new developer.
resource_bottlenecks: Increased code review and coordination load on FE Lead.
mitigation_strategies: Assign a dedicated onboarding buddy; enforce stricter PR review guidelines.
